div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2301 Cani Islands, 23 km. NE of Bizerta, (1137) Tunisia, 1916 Burial: c. 150 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 150 AR. Found in grotto with silver bracelets and ingots Carthage: 18 tetradr. (as SNGCop. 403-6) Roman Rep.: 132 den. Disposition: Tunis; London (4 Carthage) â€ Merlin, BCTH 1916, pp. cciv-cvviii Jenkins-Lewis, Carthage, p. 53 Crawford, RRCH 132
